name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On Monday, February 10, BYD announced that it will also install a new version of its intelligent driving system "Eye of God" on low-priced models. BYD will use this to achieve "full-system self-driving". The Wall Street Journal analyzed that this will further expand its lead over Tesla in launching AI-driven driving technology to Chinese car buyers. Tesla has been unable to release its latest assisted driving software in the Chinese market.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
So poor that you can't even pay 200,000 yuan? The former "nucleic acid king" Zhang Hezi was restricted from high consumption.
Recently, Shenzhen Nuclear Gene Technology Co., Ltd. and Zhang Hezi were restricted from high consumption for failing to perform the payment obligations determined by the effective legal documents within the period specified in the execution notice. The execution court is the Nanshan District People's Court of Shenzhen.
The case process information shows that in January this year, Shenzhen Nuclear Gene Technology Co., Ltd. and Shenzhen Nuclear Huaxi Medical Testing Laboratory have been forcibly executed for more than 205,000 yuan in this case.

content: On February 11, the woman said she went to the bank to handle business and was induced by the staff to open a personal pension account. The staff first took out a QR code and said it was a work WeChat account and asked the woman to scan the code. When the woman was about to scan, the staff suddenly changed a piece of paper. The woman found that the words "personal pension" were written on the paper, so she refused to scan the QR code. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1889598475526086656/pu/img/JC86_XxAnaFaSONJ.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 12, Dr. Xia Zhimin wrote that the consistency evaluation data of generic drugs was previously exposed to be a lot of similarities. On February 10, the official correction was restored after downloading, but there were still many errors. For example, there were four drugs: tenofovir disoproxil fumarate tablets, telmisartan tablets, amoxicillin capsules, and clarithromycin tablets. There was a statistical error in each generic drug.
However, the most direct responsible party for drug quality, the Food and Drug Administration, has always kept a low profile. Even when a large number of "editing errors" were exposed in the consistency evaluation data, it still did not say a word. It took half a month, but there was no explanation of what errors were self-checked and corrected, how these errors were caused, and how to avoid them in the future.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
An auntie who runs a hardware store in Anyang, Henan sold 60,000 yuan worth of wires, and then her bank card was frozen by the Anhui police. She could not get through to the Anhui police by phone. The police previously said that the money was fraudulent and needed to be returned to the victim.
The auntie collapsed and said, "The money has been returned, but what about my wire loss? Can I still ask customers if the money comes from a legitimate source when I sell things?" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1889630221659414529/pu/img/Rq94WYp1XsNraGfe.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 8, President Xu of Beijing Sino-US Aier Cancer Hospital said that the current national generic drug consistency evaluation regulations require that the efficacy of generic drugs should reach between 70% and 142 of the original drug, but most pharmaceutical companies are stuck at 70% consistency. In addition, generic drugs are unlikely to be evaluated again after they are launched, but it is meaningful to evaluate them multiple times, so the consistency evaluation of generic drugs is also a one-time evaluation. This is a problem worth worrying about. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1889634066284290052/pu/img/a124hh-y8ezjlQIH.jpg

A screenshot circulated online claimed that a dismissed employee of the store had an argument with a clerk in the store and then attacked several employees in the store with a weapon. The news has not been confirmed yet. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1889639744000360448/pu/img/hSHEEqn0mpDMKcvR.jpg

content: February 12 (Release) Henan Zhumadian. Zheng Yufeng, a man from Liancun Town, worked as an auxiliary police officer in the town in 2004. In 2010, he was stabbed by a gangster while arresting him. After being discharged from the hospital, he found that he had been fired by the town government. name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
U.S. Vice President Cyrus Vance delivered a speech at the Paris Artificial Intelligence Action Summit on Tuesday, warning European allies not to over-regulate and stifle the development of AI, and hinting that China is using artificial intelligence technology to tighten surveillance on people at home and abroad.
Vance said: "We firmly believe that artificial intelligence must be free from ideological bias, and that American artificial intelligence will not be used as a tool for censorship by authoritarian regimes"
"Some authoritarian regimes steal and use artificial intelligence to enhance military intelligence and surveillance capabilities, obtain foreign data and conduct propaganda, thereby weakening the security of other countries"
"Cooperating with these regimes is equivalent to tying your country to the authoritarian master, who will try to infiltrate, take root and seize your information infrastructure"
Vance's speech did not specifically name any country, but it clearly implied that China was one of some "authoritarian regimes." He emphasized that the Trump administration will prevent these actions.

content:
As of 12:00 noon on February 12, the number of schools on the "Shame List" for overtime learning in primary and secondary schools across the country exceeded 2,000. 
So far, a total of 2,010 schools have submitted submissions. The top five provinces are: Shandong (211 schools), Guangdong (193 schools), Henan (181 schools), Hebei (171 schools) and Jiangsu (150 schools). https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gjlq2JyWIAAttNd.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Reuters: China experienced its largest ever wave of mergers of village banks last year, but analysts say Beijing's efforts to tackle risks in the small banking sector could end up creating more problems in the future.
At least 290 Chinese rural banks and rural cooperatives were merged into larger regional banks by 2024.
Bedford, a former Asia analyst at Bridgewater and UBS, said these mergers often simply created "bigger problem banks" by merging insolvent institutions.
Over the past decade, many of China's small banks have begun to actively lend to real estate developers and local government financing platforms. This makes them vulnerable to the economic recession after the coronavirus pandemic, turmoil in the real estate market, and weak financial conditions of debt-ridden local governments.
According to reports, the latest official data showed that the non-performing loan ratio of rural commercial banks reached 3.04% in the third quarter of last year, almost the entire non-performing loan ratio of the banking industry...
fullContent:
路透社：中国去年经历了有史以来最大规模的村镇银行合并浪潮，但分析师称，中国政府应对小型银行业风险的努力，最终可能会在未来产生更多问题。
 2024年，至少有290家中国农村银行和农村合作社被合并为规模更大的地区性银行。
 桥水和瑞银前亚洲分析师贝德福德说：这些合并通常只是通过并入无力偿债的机构，而创造出“更大的问题银行”。
 过去十年，中国许多小银行开始积极向房地产开发商和地方政府融资平台提供贷款。这使它们很容易受到冠病疫情后的经济衰退、房地产市场动荡以及负债累累的地方政府财务状况疲软的影响。
 据报道，最新官方数据显示，去年第三季度农村商业银行不良贷款率达到3.04%，几乎是银行业整体不良贷款率1.56%的两倍。分析师说，许多小贷机构的财务健康状况要糟糕得多。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Samoan government said the Chinese-backed APT40 hacker group was suspected of carrying out cyber attacks on the country's government and critical infrastructure.
This is the first time a Pacific island country has publicly issued a warning, blaming cyber espionage on a group linked to the Chinese government.
A document from the Samoan National Computer Emergency Response Team said the hacker group ATP40 posed a "serious threat" to the region. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjmJT5FbwAA4SaZ.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 11, Henan. A man exposed a waste oil refining site hidden in a rural area. The video shows that the yard is full of barrels and workers are cooking slop.
Netizens replied: "I thought the rice slop was used to feed pigs, but it turns out it is used to feed us" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1889696127940984832/pu/img/0M03wsJYt0BrGRK3.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 10, Yunnan Hui Christian pastor Ma Yan was tried for "organizing an illegal gathering." It is reported that Ma Yan pleaded guilty at the trial on February 10 because the charge of "organizing an illegal gathering" carries a lighter sentence than other charges and does not cause moral stigma. At present, the court has not yet made a verdict, but the prosecution recommended a sentence of 9 months.
Human rights organization CSW said: "The arrest and prosecution of Pastor Ma Yan is another example of the Chinese Communist Party's targeting of ethnic and religious minorities and violates the Universal Declaration of Human Rights. CSW calls on the authorities to immediately release Pastor Ma Yan and declare him not guilty."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a woman said that before traveling to Russia, she thought that the friendship between China and Russia was deep, and Russians should be friendly. But when she arrived, she found that Chinese people were treated like pigs: taxi drivers overcharged them, hotel staff stole their belongings, and the hotel charged 400 yuan to change the sheets... https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1889704826432548864/pu/img/JxwAdfFy8KQLKZsH.jpg
